id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.



*See also: [TMP102 Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tmp102.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.



*See also: [TMP102 Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tmp102.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: The I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x48`. See [I²C Addresses](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tmp117.html#tmp117-i2c-addresses) for more information.



*See also: [TMP102 Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tmp102.html#configuration-variables)*
